name: Shark Growth Formula
description:
This is a joke clicker game that I made for the #VTgamejam on twitter!
It's designed to simulate what's happening in this artwork by Virtual Vi.

I ran out of time for the jam, so there's no sound, and the game is a bit boring.
Overall it was still pretty fun to make, and it was my first time making a 2D game in Unity!

Thanks to Lua Lucky on twitter for putting this jam together!

You can find me on twitter here
